Class LoanController

java.lang.Object
com.lms.library.controller.LoanController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/v1") public class LoanController extends Object
REST controller for managing loan operations in the Library Management System. Provides endpoints for checking out items, returning items, and retrieving loan information.
Since:
2025
Version:
1.0
Author:
Joel Silva

  • Constructor Details

    • LoanController

      public LoanController(LoanService loanService)
      Constructs a new LoanController with the required LoanService.
      Parameters:
      loanService - the loan service to be used by the controller

  • Method Details

    • checkoutItems

      @PostMapping("/members/{memberId}/loans") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<LoanResponse> checkoutItems(@PathVariable Long memberId, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid LoanRequest loanRequest)
      Creates a new loan for a member with the specified items.
      Parameters:
      memberId - the ID of the member checking out items
      loanRequest - the request containing list of item IDs to checkout
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the created loan details
      Throws:
      MemberNotFoundException - if the member is not found
      ItemNotFoundException - if any item is not found
      ItemNotAvailableException - if any item is not available for checkout

    • getMemberLoans

      @GetMapping("/members/{memberId}/loans") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<LoanSummaryResponse>> getMemberLoans(@PathVariable Long memberId)
      Retrieves all loans for a specific member.
      Parameters:
      memberId - the ID of the member
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing list of loan summaries for the member
      Throws:
      MemberNotFoundException - if the member is not found

    • getLoan

      @GetMapping("/loans/{loanId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<LoanResponse> getLoan(@PathVariable Long loanId)
      Retrieves detailed information about a specific loan.
      Parameters:
      loanId - the ID of the loan to retrieve
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing detailed loan information
      Throws:
      LoanNotFoundException - if the loan is not found

    • returnItems

      @PostMapping("/loans/{loanId}/returns") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<LoanResponse> returnItems(@PathVariable Long loanId, @RequestBody LoanRequest returnRequest)
      Processes the return of items for a loan. If no specific items are provided, all items in the loan are returned.
      Parameters:
      loanId - the ID of the loan to return items from
      returnRequest - optional list of specific item IDs to return
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing updated loan details
      Throws:
      LoanNotFoundException - if the loan is not found
      ItemNotFoundException - if any specified item is not found in the loan
      IllegalStateException - if the loan is already closed
